answers.answer: Your not worried having him before 36-37 weeks? I'm going to possibly be induced at 35 weeks and I'm so nervous she won't be healthy enough. :/

Babies are usually fine around 35 weeks I mean one girls. Baby was over 5 pounds at 34 weeks they survive extremely easy at this point.  The only thing is that 37 weeks is considered full term and thats it. Awwee I'm so excited for ya! I have my appt tmm I'm going to be checked for dilation I believe.  So excited I'm 35 weeks.

Kids lungs arent fully developed until 37 weeks. Doesnt matter about their weight. Too many selfish mums on here wanting their babys to come early and wanting to be dilated ( which isnt even checked for im uk) cos theyv "had enough" or jyst wanna see their babys. So would u rather them come early and have them be monitored for a while in hosp or wait few weeks and be able to takw them home soon after...

I would love for my little baby girl to stay in here til shes full term. :/ I've got preeclampsia and high blood pressure.. and lots of other issues. So that's why I probably won't make it to 37 weeks.

This is my second baby I have kidney problems its called hydronephrosis I've been in labor for 4 days now once he hits 37 weeks they are taking him he is healthy and his lungs are great he's 5 1/2 pounds almost 6 term is 36 weeks. I have an inducing date for him to be taken a week early just like my daughter was but he will most likely come before 39 weeks.
no actually its been said that 99% of babies do just fine if born at 35 weeks so you're okayy(: my sister had 4 all born at 35 or 36 and they were perfectly fine ! don't worry

I've read that a lot about babies born this early are ok.. I'm hoping to find out tmrw my news. Hope I can hold off til 36 weeks to deliver closer to home if not I'll be delivering where a nicu is just incase. =)
Thank you ladys I appreciate all the positive feed back good luck to all of you with your pregnancies and little ones (: ill be 36 weeks this Tuesday.
Good luck to you mommyOf20915. I'll be 36wks Tuesday also.
I'm also 35 weeks iv been at a 3 since 30 weeks don't get you'r hopes up. Even tho 99% of babys are fine most still need to be in the nicu when born before 37 weeks
